item.title: Ultimate CCNA & Network+ Guide for C-TEC Cybersecurity
item.description: Originally posted on Discord for C-TEC Cybersecurity students, this comprehensive guide combines CCNA and Network+ preparation, highlighting their overlapping topics and shared study strategies. It focuses on how to make the most of C-TEC’s provided resources—like Cisco Press OCGs, Packet Tracer, Jeremy’s IT Lab, and Wendell Odom’s Free CCNA Course—and offers practical advice on staying focused in class, using study tools effectively, and maximizing your chances of certification success.
